EmailTemplate.subject: Privacy in the Age of ADS-B
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Use access code 902384 to watch now.
Did you miss our webinar on February 12th? If so, we have it recorded for you!
SocialFlight President, Jeff Simon, an A&P/IA mechanic and builder, along with Roger Dykmann, BendixKing Director of Offering Management and Market Strategy, discussed how ADS-B works, where the data goes, who has access to your information and what you can do to protect yourself and your privacy.
Topics included:
- ADS-B Overview - Data You are Sharing with Every Flight - Where Your Data Goes - Who Can Access Your Flight Data - Ways to Protect Your Privacy - ADS-B Solutions
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, any webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner. WATCH THE WEBINAR HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Privacy_in_Age_of_ADS-B.html]]>
